items.sentence: Please tell Tom that he should do that as soon as he can.
We've been talking about going to Boston for a long time.
Tom didn't even bother to pretend that he was interested.
My life would be so different now if I'd gone to college.
Tom said his parents allow him to do what he wants to do.
We hurried to the station, but we still missed the train.
It's normal for a wound to itch. That means it's healing.
In case of rain, the athletic meeting will be called off.
They were speaking in a language that I didn't recognize.
Some thieves broke into one of our warehouses last night.
